name: PetIQ, Inc.
description: PetIQ, Inc. is a leading provider of pet health and wellness products, dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and their owners. Founded in 2010, PetIQ aims to make pet healthcare more accessible and affordable through a range of innovative solutions. The company specializes in manufacturing and distributing pet medications, supplements, and grooming products, catering to the growing demand for pet care in the United States. Their offerings include prescription medications, over-the-counter products, and veterinary services, which are available through various retail partners and veterinary clinics. PetIQ is also committed to education and outreach, providing pet owners with essential information on pet health, nutrition, and care. The company operates with a mission to improve the overall well-being of pets by ensuring that high-quality healthcare products are within reach for every pet owner. With a focus on innovation, PetIQ continuously develops new products and solutions that meet the evolving needs of pets and their families.

seo.meta_title: PetIQ, Inc. | Affordable Pet Health and Wellness Products
seo.meta_description: Explore PetIQ, Inc., a leader in pet health and wellness solutions. Discover our range of medications, supplements, and grooming products designed to improve pet care.

faq.question: What does PetIQ specialize in?
faq.answer: PetIQ specializes in pet health and wellness products, including medications, supplements, and grooming products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of PetIQ?
faq.answer: Curtis J. Kauffman is the CEO of PetIQ, Inc.

faq.question: Where is PetIQ headquartered?
faq.answer: PetIQ is headquartered in Eagle, Idaho, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does PetIQ offer?
faq.answer: PetIQ offers pet medications, supplements, and grooming products.
